argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | msubffval.v | |- V = ( mVR ` T ) |
| 2 |  | msubffval.r | |- R = ( mREx ` T ) |
| 3 |  | msubffval.s | |- S = ( mSubst ` T ) |
| 4 |  | msubffval.e | |- E = ( mEx ` T ) |
| 5 |  | msubffval.o | |- O = ( mRSubst ` T ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_msubval | |- ( ( F : A --> R /\ A C_ V /\ X e. E ) -> ( ( S ` F ) ` X ) = <. ( 1st ` X ) , ( ( O ` F ) ` ( 2nd ` X ) ) >. ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 1st ` X ) e. _V |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( O ` F ) ` ( 2nd ` X ) ) e. _V |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_op2ndd | |- ( ( ( S ` F ) ` X ) = <. ( 1st ` X ) , ( ( O ` F ) ` ( 2nd ` X ) ) >. -> ( 2nd ` ( ( S ` F ) ` X ) ) = ( ( O ` F ) ` ( 2nd ` X ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( F : A --> R /\ A C_ V /\ X e. E ) -> ( 2nd ` ( ( S ` F ) ` X ) ) = ( ( O ` F ) ` ( 2nd ` X ) ) ) |
